\newcommand{\lyxmathsym}[1]{\ifmmode\begingroup\def\b@ld{bold}

\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}
%% A simple dot to overcome graphicx limitations
\newcommand{\lyxdot}{.}

\numberwithin{equation}{section}
\numberwithin{figure}{section}
\newenvironment{lyxlist}[1]
{\begin{list}{}
{\settowidth{\labelwidth}{#1}
 \setlength{\leftmargin}{\labelwidth}
 \addtolength{\leftmargin}{\labelsep}
 \renewcommand{\makelabel}[1]{##1\hfil}}}
{\end{list}}

\section{\noindent Water}


\subsection{Target Weight}
\begin{itemize}
\item Weight after watering (target weight).
\item Colnum name: weight.b
\item Unit: g\end{itemize}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"Weight B (g)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}

\subsection{Water consumption}
\begin{itemize}
\item Consumption of water based of weight measurments
\item Column name: water
\item Unit: g
\end{itemize}

\section{\noindent Biomass}
\begin{itemize}
\item Digital Biomass based on the side.area and top.area
\item Unit: pixel\textthreesuperior{}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{IAP}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{IAP}=\sqrt{side.area_{average}^{2}*top.area_{average}}$
\item Column name: digital.biomass.iap.norm\end{itemize}
%\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
%\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{digital\lyxdot biomass\lyxdot iap\lyxdot norm}}]~
%\end{lyxlist}

\subsection{LemnaTec}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{LemnaTec}=\sqrt{side.area_{0\lyxmathsym{�}}*side.area_{90\text{�}}*top.area}$
%\item Column name: digital.biomass.lemnatec.norm
\end{itemize}

\subsection{KeyGene}
\begin{itemize}
\item Equation: $Biomass_{KeyGene}=side.area_{0\text{�}}+side.area_{90\text{�}}+\log(\frac{top.area}{3})$
\item Column name: digital.biomass.keygene.norm\end{itemize}
%\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
%\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{digital\lyxdot biomass\lyxdot keygene\lyxdot norm}}]~
%\end{lyxlist}

\section{General Descriptors}

\subsection{Height}
\begin{itemize}
\item Plant height (mm) (normalized to distance of left and right marker)
\item Column name: side.height.norm
\item Unit: mm
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot height\lyxdot norm (mm)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Width}
\begin{itemize}
\item Plant width (mm) (normalized to distance of left and right marker) 
\item Column name: side.width.norm
\item Unit: mm
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot width\lyxdot norm (mm)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Projected Side Area}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of foreground pixels from side camera
\item Colum name: side.area.norm
\item Unit: pixel\texttwosuperior{}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot area\lyxdot norm (mm2)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\section{Fluorescence}


\subsection{Chlorophyll}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average activity of chlorophyll, based on red reflection.
\item The darker the higher acitivity
\item Column name: side.fluo.intensity.chlorophyl.average
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot chlorophyl\lyxdot average (relative)\string"}}]~
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram\lyxdot bin\lyxdot 1\lyxdot 0_25;side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogr\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Other}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average activity without chlorohyll (e. g. phenol), based of yellow
reflection.
\item The darker the higher acitivity
\item Column name: side.fluo.intensity.phenol.average
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
%\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
%\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot fluo\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot phenol\lyxdot average\string"}}]~
%\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{NIR Intensity}
\begin{itemize}
\item Average intensity of near infrared (NIR)
\item Represents the water content of the plant
\item Column name: side.nir.intensity.average
\item Unit: relative intensity/pixel
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot intensity\lyxdot average (relative)\string"}}]~
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram\lyxdot bin\lyxdot 1\lyxdot 0_25;side\lyxdot nir\lyxdot normalized\lyxdot histogram\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\section{Plant Structure}


\subsection{Number of leafs}
\begin{itemize}
\item Number of leafs-tips
\item Colum name: side.leaf.count.median
\item Unit: leafs
\item Hint: leaf-tips are shown as red retangles in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot leaf\lyxdot count\lyxdot median (leafs)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Tassel}
\begin{itemize}
\item Male flower count
\item Colum name: side.bloom.count
\item Unit: tassel
\item Hint: the number of blue retangles in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot bloom\lyxdot count (tassel)\string"}}]~
\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Length}
\begin{itemize}
\item Length of all leafs plus stem
\item Column name: side.leaf.length.sum.norm.max
\item Unit: mm
\item Hint: the yellow line in the image
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{\includegraphics[width=13cm]{\string"side\lyxdot leaf\lyxdot length\lyxdot sum\lyxdot norm\lyxdot max (mm)\string"}}]~\end{lyxlist}
\end{itemize}
